remarks: Adding both sides of two orderings.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
leidd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ltnegd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
ltadd1d.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
lt2addd.4 $e |- ( ph -> D e. RR ) $.
leltaddd.5 $e |- ( ph -> A <_ C ) $.
leltaddd.6 $e |- ( ph -> B < D ) $.
leltaddd $p |- ( ph -> ( A + B ) < ( C + D ) ) $.
